StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetShipQuotaRqmtForRegion]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body: @FiscalYear int, @CategoryCode char(2), @Recrui.ngOrgID int AS SELECT SHIPPING_QUOTA_PLAN.ORGANIZATION_ID, MONTH_CODE.MONTH_CODE, QUOTA_VALUE, REQMT_VALUE, RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION.SHORT_NAME FROM RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SHIPPING_QUOTA_PLAN ON RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION.ORGANIZATION_ID = SHIPPING_QUOTA_PLAN.ORGANIZATION_ID INNER JOIN MONTH_CODE ON SHIPPING_QUOTA_PLAN.MONTH_CODE = MONTH_CODE.MONTH_CODE INNER JOIN ORGANIZATION_MAP ON RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION.ORGANIZATION_ID = ORGANIZATION_MAP.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID WHERE SHIPPING_QUOTA_PLAN.FISCAL_YEAR = @FiscalYear AND RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION.ORGANIZATION_TYPE = 'D' AND SHIPPING_QUOTA_PLAN.CATEGORY_CODE = @CategoryCode AND ORGANIZATION_MAP.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID = @Recrui.ngOrgID AND MONTH_CODE.MONTH_CODE > 0 ORDER BY RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION.ORGANIZATION_ID,RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION.ISOPEN DESC, RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION.SHORT_NAME, MONTH_CODE.DISPLAY_ORDER
